data.title: 1943) : Auction Sales, Auction Prices, Indices & Biography of Naoum Aronson: LiveArt
data.meta_description: Learn about Naoum Aronson  (1872 - 1943),  artist, and their past and upcoming works offered at auction at LiveArt.
data.text:
Benchmark Comparisons

Compare the performance of the artist against established market benchmarks (S&P 500, Real estate, Dow Jones), or other artists.

Median Realized Compound Annual Returns (CAR)

Discover a tendency of how the artist or artwork has performed as investment, eliminating the effect of unusually high or low returns.

Realized Returns (CAR) against Holding Period

See the return percentage an artwork has generated over a specific holding period, reflecting how the artworkâ€™s value has grown annually during the time it was held.

Artist Career Path

Explore the most prolific periods in an artist's career based on artwork production volume and current market value. It also segments these periods by category, offering insights into when the most valuable pieces were created in each category.

Sales Performance

Dive into the detailed performance at public auctions over time, including the distribution of sales volume across different regions and countries.
